welcome.title: Welcome to Abbacchio
welcome.subtitle: Real-time log viewer for any application
welcome.description: Abbacchio is a powerful real-time log viewer with official support for Node.js (Pino, Winston) and Python, plus any language or tool that can send HTTP requests. Stream logs from your applications instantly with optional end-to-end encryption.

features.title: Key Features
features.realtimeDesc: See logs the instant they're emitted

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Click "Add Channel" below and enter a channel name
quickStart.step2: Install the transport for your platform (Node.js, Python, or use HTTP)
quickStart.step3: Configure your logger to send logs to Abbacchio
quickStart.step4: Start your app and watch the logs stream in!

welcome.urlHint: Pro tip: You can also connect via URL params:
welcome.httpDescription: No installation required. Send logs via HTTP POST request from any language or tool.

noLogs.title: No logs yet
noLogs.description: Send logs from your application using one of the methods below

noMatches.title: No matching logs
noMatches.description: Try adjusting your search or filters

connectionFailed.title: Connection failed
connectionFailed.defaultError: Unable to connect to the server
connectionFailed.hint: Check if the server is running

persistence.enabledDescription: Logs will be saved to SQLite storage
persistence.disabledDescription: Logs will only be kept in memory

toast.invalidKeyDescription: Key must be exactly 43 characters (base64url encoded)
toast.channelNameRequiredDescription: Please enter a channel name to connect
